TopicTitle: What's the highest structure possible? / Space ladder

Articles.Content:
I had an idea. It will, of course, take a lot of work. So here is it.

What would be the highest structure you could build, from the ground up? I mean from the surface of Kerbin, into the sky. You would first build some kind of base structure, then use rockets to put additional parts on top. You could put ladders on everything, so the Kerbals could, in theory, climb up all the way into space.

Would I run into framerate issues? Can it be done? These are the questions I may, or may not, answer in the future. I think this idea may be stretching the game engine beyond its limits though...

2.25kms. Any farther than that from the root part, and KSP does not fully simulate ship parts.

In actuality, you will probably never reach the limit because of stability and part count. With use of tweakscale, however, I believe people have gotten craft to be slightly taller.

I would rep to death if you would actually build to 2.2km (vertical) in stock.
